channel.title: Compiler error
channel.description:
I was doing a tutorial and i got this error when i compiled and have been trying to fix it and if anyone knows how to fix it i would appreciate it here's the error [code]source\server\model\players\Player.java:1935: error: illegal start of expression
public boolean isNpc = false; ^ source\server\model\players\Player.java:1936: error: illegal start of expression
public int npcId2 = 0; ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
